review: If you are planning to visit Haridwar and wants your trip to be budget friendly then this may be your option.This is a kind of DHARAMSHALA.  ROOMS - rooms are clean, air conditioned/cooler, attached washrooms , no television in rooms. FOOD - it has in-house place for food. they had a fix menu. and they serve simple food(ghar ka khana) .  They also had free parking facility, a temple and a 24-hour reception desk.   Thus, this is an average hotel and budget friendly.
name: travelbnaiya
